meta.name: Audio & Video Data Search and Analysis with Clarify API and AI Agent Integration

parameters.content:
### ‚öôÔ∏è Setup Instructions

1. **Import Workflow**: 
Load this workflow into your n8n instance

2. **Authentication**: 
No authentication required

3. **Activate Workflow**:
Enable the workflow to start the MCP server

4. **Get MCP URL**: 
Copy the webhook URL from the MCP trigger

5. **Connect AI Agent**:
Use the MCP URL in your AI agent configuration


### üí° Usage Notes
‚Ä¢ Parameters are auto-populated by AI using $fromAI() expressions
‚Ä¢ With 21 API endpoints available as tools
‚Ä¢ Responses maintain original API structure


### üõ†Ô∏è Customization
‚Ä¢ Add data transformation nodes if needed
‚Ä¢ Implement custom error handling
‚Ä¢ Add logging or monitoring nodes

‚Ä¢ Modify parameter defaults in any HTTP request node as needed

### üí¨ Need Help?
Ping me on [discord](https://discord.me/cfomodz) for integration guidance and custom automations. Check the [n8n documentation](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/cluster-nodes/sub-nodes/n8n-nodes-langchain.toolmcp/) for more information.

## üõ†Ô∏è api.clarify.io MCP Server ‚úÖ 21 operations

### About
The API to Search and Understand Audio & Video Data.

### üîß How it Works

This workflow converts the api.clarify.io API into an MCP-compatible interface for AI agents.

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **HTTP Request Nodes**: Handle API calls to https://api.clarify.io/
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Returns responses directly to the AI agent


### üìã Available Operations (21 endpoints)

**Bundles (18 operations)**
List Bundles, Create Bundle, Delete Bundle, Retrieve Bundle, Update Bundle, Retrieve Bundle Insights, Request Insight Run, Retrieve Bundle Insight, Delete Bundle Metadata, Retrieve Bundle Metadata, Update Bundle Metadata, Delete Bundle Tracks, Retrieve Bundle Tracks, Add Bundle Track, Update Bundle Tracks, Delete Bundle Track, Retrieve Bundle Track, Add Media to Track

**Reports (2 operations)**
Generate Group Report, Generate Trends Report

**Search (1 operations)**
Search Bundles

parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('iterator', 'optional opaque value, automatically provided in next/prev links, or literal "first", "last"', 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
List bundles

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ limit (optional) - Limit results to specified number of bundles. Default is 10. Max 100.
  ‚Ä¢ embed (optional) - List of link relations to embed in the result collection. Zero or more of: items, tracks, metadata, insights. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings
  ‚Ä¢ iterator (optional) - Optional opaque value, automatically provided in next/prev links, or literal "first", "last"

Create a bundle

Parameters:

Delete a bundle

Parameters:
- Path parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ bundle_id (required) - Id of a bundle

Parameters:
- Path parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ bundle_id (required) - Id of a bundle

parameters.toolDescription:
Generate Group Report beta

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ interval (required) - Duration of report periods. Default is month.
  ‚Ä¢ score_field (required) - A bundle/metadata field to use as a score. Ex. insights.spoken_words.listener_score.
  ‚Ä¢ group_field (required) - A metadata field by which to group scores, typically a user or team id field.
  ‚Ä¢ filter (optional) - Filter expression, typically programmatically generated based on input controls and data segregation rules etc. Up to 500 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ language (optional) - Language to search in, specified with an RFC5646 code. Default is "en"

parameters.toolDescription:
Generate Trends Report beta

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ interval (required) - Duration of report periods. Default is month.
  ‚Ä¢ content (optional) - Content reported in each period. Zero or more of tracks, spoken_words, spoken_keywords. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings.
  ‚Ä¢ filter (optional) - Filter expression, typically programmatically generated based on input controls and data segregation rules etc. Up to 500 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ language (optional) - Language to search in, specified with an RFC5646 code. Default is "en"

parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('query', 'search terms, typically as typed into a search field. Up to 120 characters.', 'string') }}

parameters.name: query_fields
parameters.value: ={{ $fromAI('query_fields', 'list of insights, metadata, and bundle fields to search with the query. Use insights.spoken_words for searching audio, metadata.* for all metadata fields, bundle.* for all bundle fields, * for audio and all fields. Default is insights.spoken_words and metadata.*. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings. If single string, up to 1024 characters.', 'string') }}

parameters.toolDescription:
Search bundles

Parameters:
- Query parameters:
  ‚Ä¢ query (optional) - Search terms, typically as typed into a search field. Up to 120 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ query_fields (optional) - List of insights, metadata, and bundle fields to search with the query. Use insights.spoken_words for searching audio, metadata.* for all metadata fields, bundle.* for all bundle fields, * for audio and all fields. Default is insights.spoken_words and metadata.*. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings. If single string, up to 1024 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ filter (optional) - Filter expression, typically programmatically generated based on input controls and data segregation rules etc. Up to 500 characters.
  ‚Ä¢ language (optional) - Language to search in, specified with an RFC5646 code. Default is "en"
  ‚Ä¢ limit (optional) - Limit results to specified number of bundles. Default is 10. Max 100.
  ‚Ä¢ embed (optional) - List of link relations to embed in the result collection. Zero or more of: items, tracks, metadata, insights. List is space or comma separated single string or an array of strings
  ‚Ä¢ iterator (optional) - Opaque value, automatically provided in next/prev links
